metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3226 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in json/encoding.rb in Active Support in Ruby on Rails 3.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.11 and 4.2.x before 4.2.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted Hash that is mishandled during JSON encoding.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> in Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition

criterions.comment: ruby-activesupport-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
